price: Bahkan, mereka mengambil pemberi syafaat selain Allah.  Katakanlah, "Dan apakah (kamu mengambilnya juga), meskipun mereka tidak memiliki sesuatu pun dan tidak berakal?"
arabic: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ شُفَعَآءَۚ قُلۡ أَوَلَوۡ كَانُواْ لَا يَمۡلِكُونَ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا يَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: ami ittakhadhū min dūni al-lahi shufaʿāa qul awalaw kānū lā yamlikūna shayan walā yaʿqilūna
